extendedInfo.description: ConverterAN Pro (Demo) is a unit conversion program for most commonly used units. Features:* 19 categories of units: Acceleration, angle, area, astronomical, computer, density, energy, flow rate, force, frequency, fuel consumption, length, mass, power, pressure, speed, temperature, torque, and volume units* currency conversion with daily rate updates* 17 useful references* 14 handy calculations including package comparison* Respective user interface design for tablets and phonesDemo Info:* Some features are disabled in reference, and calculation* Rate update is disabledTo purchase the full version, please visit our web site.Keywords: base, reference, imperial, metric, converter, unit converter

reviews.title: Pretty good, but...
reviews.comment: Way better than the average converter, with several useful sections like currency, clothing sizes, ZIP codes, etc. Worth getting. BUT my big gripe is that while I would buy the $5 upgrade, it must be done on their websites. Guys, hello... too hard!
reviews.author: Brett Cupitt

reviews.comment: It\'S look a good app but not everything work on it, maybe on futute
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Trial is very limited. But full version looks promising.
reviews.author: A Google User
